title: Serif font
content:
Hi,  
was wondering what this font is called?  
Thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014195538im_/http:/typophile.com/files/azertyuiodfgh_4544.png)
author: Emma-L

comments.content: It's [[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/berling/]Berling]. A Text or Book weight though.

Oops! Amateur linking on my part, [Berling](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014195538/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/berling/)

Next time I'll preview it beforehand ;)
